title: Created work document locator service PoC at work
description: The document locator service at work grabs resource paths and resolves a media link for a cloud storage file. This service, inside the monolith, was executed serverside and has horrible performance, and has a lot of problems.
As usual, Rewriting It In Rust™️ was a great idea, so i added a PoC that i will extend depending on how much "free" time i have at work.

For now it correctly resolves the resource, gets the metadata and grabs the media link. The hard parts are ahead; caching, connecting with a metadata source of truth (redis), processing, resizing, etc etc.
